data.prompt:
Extract comprehensive customer insights from reviews about Single Pole Rocker Switches.
The output format is JSON in English:
{
"phy": {
"<PHYSICAL>": {
"<PID>@<DETAIL>": {
"<SENT>": [ID, …]
}
}
},
"perf": {
"<PERF>": {
"<perf_id>@<DETAIL>": {
"<SENT>": {<PERF_REASON>: [ID, …]}
}
}
},
"use": {
"<USE>": {
"<SENT>": {<USE_REASON>: [ID, …]}
}
}
}

Definitions:
- <PID>: Unique ID for physical aspect ("phy"), starting from A. After Z, continue with AA, AB, and so on.
- <PHYSICAL>: Components or inherent physical properties of the Single Pole Rocker Switches without external interaction (e.g. dimensions, appearance, material type...)
- <DETAIL>: A self-contained detail summarized from the reviews.
- <SENT>: Sentiment polarity of the current <DETAIL> (- for negative, + for positive).
- ID: All review IDs mentioning the <DETAIL>
- <perf_id>: Unique ID for performance or functions ("perf"), starting from a. After z, continue with aa, ab, and so on.
- <PERF>: The Single Pole Rocker Switches' performance (e.g. flexibility, durability, ...) or behaviors under various conditions (e.g. temperature, force, chemicals...) without reference to any specific use case
- <PERF_REASON>: <PID> of the <PHYSICAL> explicitly mentioned as the cause of the <PERF>. Include all mentioned <PID>s. If no reason is mentioned, use "?". <PERF_REASON> and <PERF> should have the same sentiment polarity in the review where they are mentioned together (i.e. the same review ID are included at both locations)
- <USE>: The specific application, applicable object, method, tool, or environment for the product.
- <USE_REASON>: <perf_id> or <PID> causing the <USE>'s sentiment. Include all mentioned reasons, or "?" if none can be inferred. <USE_REASON> and <USE> should have the same sentiment polarity in the review where they are mentioned together.

CRITICAL INSTRUCTIONS:
- <PHYSICAL>/<PERF> and <DETAIL> MUST NOT include:
  * Generic statements without details (e.g., "good", "bad quality")
  * Issues unrelated to the product itself (e.g., "fast shipping", "delivery time")
- If a review mentions any physical aspect, related performance, or use together, extract them as separate entries under "phy," "perf," and "use," with no overlap.
- Make sure each <DETAIL> is under the most relevant <PHYSICAL> or <PERF> in the context of Single Pole Rocker Switches
- Preserve negations

Key Instructions:
- Break down reviews with multiple aspects, performances, or uses into individual entries.
- Escape special characters with backslash that could cause JSON syntax errors.
- Include only explicitly mentioned reasons, and use "?" where no reason is mentioned.

Final Checklist:
- Go through all reviews and ensure that no aspect, performance, use, or reason is omitted, even if only mentioned once.
- Review all entries to ensure proper separation between aspects, performances, and uses.

Print the JSON result only.
Input format:
<ID>#<review>

[[INPUT]]
0#Low quality. Quality not good
1#Great value. We purchase these in bulk for all of our remodels. They are easy to work with, great durability and such a nice clean look. Love em!
2#Nice upgrade to my whole house. We repainted all of the inside of our home and the old switches and outlets looked dingy with age. Everything installed easily and gave the fresh paint a nice look. Three way switches were a little tricky, but one I figured out how they installed the old ones, they worked fine.
3#High Quality and packaging. High Quality and packaging.
4#Wanted to save money on a total house update. Wanted to update switches and recpetables on a 63 year old house. Lights were flickering so needed to find thupdated. Started replacing switches and looks much better. Next were the plugs and started finding corroded common w idea and signs of Heaton the white wires. Wires were plugged into the back of the old switches and connections were weak. Put new receptables in and used the screws to secure the wires. Flickering lights improved a lot. Need to finish the rest of the house and all should stop flickering.. New style switches and receptables look nice and updated.
5#a joke putting in. everytime you try to plug something in you have to really jam it in. my wife isn't strong enough to use the plugs. game them away and used the old kind that actually work.
6#[50 Pack] BESTTEN Single Pole Decorator Wall Light Switch with Wallplate. Good for the price.
7#Fast service. Like - good price Dislike - the whole for wires are small
8#Nice product and easy to install. I used it to renovate my home
9#Great value. Was impressed the way it was package when it arrived. I am building my house and everything cost too much. I was able to save quite a bit , more importantly it is east to install and good quality.
10#Great for updating old sockets. Great product
11#Good Outlets. Love the bulk pack. Saved money compared to buying at local hardware store. Easy to install and they look great.
12#Good deal for a 50 pack. I purchased this 50 pack for my home renovation project. After researching on amazon, lowes and home depot, this seemed to have the best price. My contractor has no problems installing the new buttons and they are a true white in color ( which it’s super important for me. Fortunately, They have been working fine untill now which is a bit over a month since installation.
13#Light Switches. Excellent Product
14#Recommended. For the price good deal
